about_the_game:
Welcome to The Quick and the Dead, a rollicking expansion for Age of Fear 5: The Day of the Rat! This devious quest can be played at any time during the main campaign.

A female Rat Assassin living in exile needs your help to win her way back into the good graces of the Ratmen nest. Naturally, a nefarious scheme is at the center of her plot for redemption...

...and who could be better suited to the job than the lawless Indulf and his partner-in-crime Lexa!

FEATURE LIST


⭐ EPIC ADVENTURE by land and by sea in pursuit of succulent prizes!

⭐ CHALLENGING ENCOUNTERS against many powerful foes in the slums of Sorodon and beyond!

⭐ A CUNNING HEROINE armed with forbidden knowledge!

short_description: Team up with an exiled Rat Assassin in her dastardly quest for redemption! Are you cunning enough to see this criminal scheme through to the end?
